item.description:
Hi, Everyone! Join us for a fun evening dancing at Kadanse on Saturday, May 11! 

At 6:30pm, we will be running an open level group class. 

Immediately following the lesson, we will be hosting a Ballroom & Latin dance party that will run until 10pm. 
...
New to ballroom (or have a friend who has been wanting to give it a try)? Don't worry...the members of this event are friendly and helpful and have all been beginners at one point:) 

Join as we dance to the rhythms of Swing, Mambo, ChaCha, Foxtrot, Waltz, etc... 

We would love to see you at either the lesson, the party, or both! 

Entrance: $15 includes lesson, party & light refreshments 

Please feel free to call us directly or email here if you have any questions. We look forward to seeing you! 

-Fitz & Kelley 

KADANSE 

781-27-DANCE (273-2623) 

info@kadanse.com 

www.kadanse.com

LOCATION: 78ee Olympia Ave, Woburn, MA. From 128, take the Washington street exit, #36. Turn right on Washington St & right on Olympia Ave. We are located directly between Athletic Evolution & the Rock Gym.

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: May Dance Party!!
